title: Private Credit Riskier in Australia on Property Bets, CIOs Warn
description: Private-credit investments are growing increasingly risky in Australia due to their heavy weighting toward the property sector, some of the nation’s biggest funds say.
content: Private-credit investments are growing increasingly risky in Australia due to their heavy weighting toward the property sector, some of the nation’s biggest funds say.
